title: (Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media) Order 2020.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser 
(Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister tourism culture art gaeltacht sport media) order 2020

title: (Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media) Order 2020.
heading: Juno McEnroe, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. 

Juno McEnroe, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and 
Media, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Tourism, 
Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media with effect from 1st September
text_norm: 2 juno mcenroe particular whose address deposited office department tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium appointed special adviser minister tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium effect 1st september

title: (Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media) Order 2020.
heading: GIVEN under my Official Seal of the Government,
text_raw:
2020. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal of the Government, 

13 October, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 
Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
 “Iris Oifigiúil” of 16th October, 2020.
